citation: Proclamation under the New Tax System Price Exploitation Code (Tasmania) Act 1999 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the New Tax System Price Exploitation Code (Tasmania) Act 1999

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(2) of the New Tax System Price Exploitation Code (Tasmania) Act 1999 fix 10 December 1999 as the day on which the provisions of that Act, except Part 1, commence.

8 December 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

DAVID CREAN

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 9 December 1999

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
